thread.title: Oil Inches Higher Ahead of U.S. Stocks Data

author: Christopher Alessi
title: Oil Inches Higher Ahead of U.S. Stocks Data
text:
Oil prices resumed their climb Wednesday, shrugging off U.S. data showing an unexpected rise in crude oil and gasoline inventories as investors focused on geopolitical risk.
Prices initially tumbled following data from the U.S. Energy Information Administration showing that crude oil stockpiles rose by 2.2 million barrels last week, when analysts expected the data to show U.S. crude stockpiles fell. Gasoline inventories also unexpectedly rose by 800,000 barrels, raising concerns that fuel demand, which has helped drive prices...
